channel.title: Get Started on C-MOOR
channel.description: Recent content in Get Started on C-MOOR

item.description: Get Started C-MOOR teaches data analysis using the R programming language. If you’ve never done any programming before, welcome! We’ve got tutorials to get you up to speed. All of our tutorial series start with a basic overview, which you can access directly from this site without having to sign up or install anything. If you just want to browse and get an idea of what we have, or get an introduction to a topic, these are a great place to start.
